MediaQueryListAddListener.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The deprecated addListener() method of the
interface adds a listener to the
MediaQueryListener that will run a custom callback function in response to
the media query status changing.

remarks.para:
In older browsers MediaQueryList did not yet inherit from ,
so this method was provided as an alias of .
Use addEventListener() instead of addListener() if it is
available in the browsers you need to support.
